mean_cn: n. 美索不达米亚（两河流域）；  adj. 美索不达米亚的
mean_en: of or relating to region of Asia between the Tigris and Euphrates rivers
word_etyma: Meso=middle中间+potam=river河 + ian...的 /人→ 位于两条河之间的 → 美索不达米亚（两河流域）
sentence: The ancient Mesopotamian civilizations were very advanced.
sentence_trans: 古美索不达米亚文明曾非常发达。
